name: SystolicBloodPressureLessThan140
title: Systolic Blood Pressure Less Than 140
description: Can also includes codes that represent systolic blood pressure < 130 or 130-139.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Most recent systolic blood pressure < 140),(Data Element Scope: Representative systolic blood pressure  < 140),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT Level II codes that represent only a systolic blood pressure < 140.  Can also includes codes that represent systolic blood pressure < 130 or 130-139.),(Exclusion Criteria: Diastolic blood pressure codes, codes that represent both a systolic and diastolic reading)

contains.display: Most recent systolic blood pressure less than 130 mm Hg (DM) (HTN, CKD, CAD)
